DOC.brief_title: Randomized Study Alendronate Adult Patients With Cystic Fibrosis Related Osteoporosis
DOC.detailed_description: PROTOCOL OUTLINE : This randomize , double blind study . Patients stratify accord sex ( male v female ) osteoporosis disease severity ( mild v severe ) . Patients randomize one two treatment arm . Patients undergo bioavailability assessment confirm ability absorb alendronate . Arm I : Patients receive calcium vitamin D supplement placebo daily one month . Arm II : Patients receive calcium vitamin D supplement oral alendronate daily one month . Treatment continue difference see bone mineral density treatment arm . Patients follow biochemical response week 6 , 12 , 52 . Bone mineral density measure 1 year 2 year . Completion date provide represent completion date grant per OOPD record
